## What is Mazingira Day?

Mazingira Day, celebrated every **June 5th**, coincides with World Environment 
Day. In Kenya, it is a national holiday dedicated to environmental conservation, 
tree planting, and raising awareness about our natural heritage. 

![Children planting trees during Mazingira Day](imagesmazingira-day-cover.jpeg)
